articles.title: Oil price spikes to $139 on talks about Russia oil ban, Iran deal delay - Reuters.com
articles.description: Oil prices spiked to their highest levels since 2008 on Monday amid market supply fears as the United States and European allies considered banning Russian oil imports and prospects for a swift return of Iranian crude to global markets receded.
